content.name: Darth Vader
content.description: Darth Vader, born Anakin Skywalker, is a fictional character in the Star Wars universe.

content.name: Luke Skywalker
content.description: Luke Skywalker is a fictional character appearing as the central protagonist of the original film trilogy and as a minor character in the prequel trilogy of the Star Wars universe created by George Lucas.

content.name: Han Solo
content.description: Han Solo is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise, portrayed in films by Harrison Ford.
